meanings: (힘·세력 등이) weak, feeble, light; (바람 등이) gentle

vlive.korean: [센 연기는 약함] 저기요, 뭐 하시는 거냐고요. 빨리 떡볶이 만들어줘요. [Not good at acting angry] Excuse me. What are you doing? Make tteokbokki. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [FULL] 더 보이즈 '꽃미남 분식집' 4회 The BOYZ "Flower Snack" ep.4
vlive.english: [Not good at acting angry] Excuse me. What are you doing? Make tteokbokki.

vlive.korean: 그냥 제일 약해 보였던 팀? The weakest team? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 19. 3억 쯤은 다들 있ㅈㅕ..?? FLEX 터지는 서울대 바팩과 붙을 학교는??
나 심장 약해 인마! "My heart is weak, punk!" 듣기 View video ASTRO : 봄에는 봄날애💕
지금 너무 약하게 해서 이런가? Is it because it's too weak? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티니 마음에 탕🍬탕🍬사탕❤
vlive.english: Is it because it's too weak?

vlive.korean: 얘 원래 이렇게 술이 약해요? Does he get easily drunk like this? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 내 거잖아요, 이거 (Feat.선글라스) [가두리횟집] EP05
vlive.english: Does he get easily drunk like this?

examples.korean: If power was an illusion, wasn't weakness necessarily one also? (Lois McMaster Bujold) 발음듣기 만일 권력이 환상이라면, 약함도 필연적으로 그러하지 않은가? (로이스 맥마스터 부욜, 명예명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If power was an illusion, wasn't weakness necessarily one also? (Lois McMaster Bujold) 발음

examples.korean: In this way, the movies are able to mix emotions with action to fully show both the strengths and weaknesses of the hero. 발음듣기 이러한 방식으로, 영화는 영웅의 강함과 약함 모두를 보여주기 위해 감정을 액션과 혼합할 수 있다. Neungyule
examples.english: In this way, the movies are able to mix emotions with action to fully show both the strengths and weaknesses of the hero. 발음

examples.korean: It focuses on other people’s mistakes and weaknesses. 발음듣기 그것은 다른 사람들의 실수와 약함에 집중합니다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: It focuses on other people’s mistakes and weaknesses. 발음

examples.korean: These include fatigue, weakness, bruising easily and depression. 발음듣기 이 증상에는 피로, 약함, 쉽게 멍이 듦, 그리고 우울함이 포함되어 있어요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: These include fatigue, weakness, bruising easily and depression. 발음

examples.korean: And he realized that his strength would be made perfect in weakness. 발음듣기 그리고 그는 자신의 힘이 약함 안에서 완벽하게 이루어진다는 것을 깨달았다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: And he realized that his strength would be made perfect in weakness. 발음
